price: Ẹ gbé òṣùwọ̀n náà dúró pẹ̀lú dọ́gbadọ́gba. Kí ẹ sì má ṣe dín òṣùwọ̀n kù.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلۡوَزۡنَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَلَا تُخۡسِرُواْ ٱلۡمِيزَانَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-wazna bil-qis'ṭi walā tukh'sirū al-mīzāna
